perfect for graduation and pics the quality is thick and not itchy no transparency the fit is cute it's a good price and the color isn't faded
This is a great gaduation gown. The green color is really nice. The material is soft but also has a nice texture. It is not silky or glossy.

The fabric quality and color are as advertised. The tassel included the current and previous year charm to change out if need be. Just be sure not to toss it out with the bag. It was well packaged and arrived in good condition. Trying to interpret the sizing chart was my only hangup. I ordered a size up because based on the chart sizes for arms, chest height etc, I was either going to order too short or too long, too long can be hemmed. The smaller size in my case likely would have worked. Though this one was longer than anticipated it doesn't drag so it works.
Bought black for photos. (He didn’t receive his real one until week of graduation). It is thin, but not see through thin. Exactly as stated in description.
very good material and it fit well

评论详情: Not bad for the price, but the tassel had 2023 on it instead of 2025 on it and therefore we just have to remove it to use the product
My original gown was so old that it disintegrated.  This was received in one day and looked like it was an expensive gown!  Very happy!

评论概述: Nice gown for the price, thin, not matte
评论详情: I'm 5'-7" and 145 lbs, and this gown fits me very well. I attend commencement once a year, and I do own a few gowns. This gown is the least expensive gown in my closet. The fabric and the quality of the stitches are decent for the price. The fabric seems to be some sort of polyester. It has a sheen to it and is quite thin, allowing light to pass through during a bright sunny day. Considering the price and what you are getting, this is a bargain.
Would size up if you want to cover your ancles. I loved this, good fabric and hat is sturdy.
Good quality fabric, would size up if you want your ankles to be covered.
I did not receive the tassle or 2024 charm as described would be included. His graduation is in 2 days. I complained when received 5 days ago and still no response.
This is a great set. Bright color and good quality. Got for kids to take pictures in after end of each school year. Works great!
This is a very nice, high-quality cap/gown combination. The fabric is thick enough, and the sizing is right on the mark based on the documentation. Fits perfectly.

In fact, it's probably the best graduation robe that I've ever worn - and I've been so fortunate as to have worn more than a few (lots of Halloweens - you know).  The fabric was relatively heavy - not cheap and flimsy like I might have been expecting.  The tailoring was as good as anything I've worn, and the stitching was everything it should be - no gaps or loose threads.  It was nicely hemmed at the edges, instead of just cut off.  The size was exactly what I hoped for.  The cap fit well, was properly-sized, and had some elastic on it so that it fit my head securely and comfortably.  The tassel came with last year's charm on it, but a charm for the current year was tossed into the bag.It all made me wish I really was getting some kind of fancy degree.I was very pleased.  Highly recommended.
Son says it fits perfectly thanks
Looks just like the picture and came on time.
